participant_1.name: Eli Turner
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, Eli is always exploring the boundaries of his unique abilities.
participant_1.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i was born with my heart outside my body. i am a boy.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Energetic and motivational, Liam thrives on helping others achieve their personal best.
participant_2.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

content.text:
Oksana Danilova:
How old are you?
i am sorry , i am not sure what that means .
that is cool , i am a huge fan of duty , but i am not sure .
